sections.heading: taxes; how collected; credited to General Fund
sections.text: Occupation tax or taxes to be paid as provided in sections 21-301 to 21-330 may be recovered by an action in the name of the state and on collection shall be remitted to the State Treasurer for credit to the General Fund.SourceLaws 1913, c. 240, § 14, p

21-314.Occupation taxes; how collected; credited to General Fund.

Occupation tax or taxes to be paid as provided in sections 21-301 to 21-330 may be recovered by an action in the name of the state and on collection shall be remitted to the State Treasurer for credit to the General Fund.

SourceLaws 1913, c. 240, § 14, p. 750;R.S.1913, § 774;C.S.1922, § 692;C.S.1929, § 24-1714;R.S.1943, § 21-314;Laws 1969, c. 124, § 7, p. 573;Laws 1988, LB 800, § 2;Laws 2003, LB 524, § 9;Laws 2014, LB749, § 247.
